what: Column specification for data about performance on the Forward Exam — SPEC_FOR_FORWARD
title: Column specification for data about performance on the Forward Exam — SPEC_FOR_FORWARD
text: Column specification data performance Forward Exam

title: Column specification for data about performance on the Forward Exam — SPEC_FOR_FORWARD
Column specification for data about performance on the Forward Exam — SPEC_FOR_FORWARD
text: list 20 elements SCHOOL_YEAR <chr> school year, YYYY-YY format AGENCY_TYPE <chr> helps distinguish district-run independent charter schools CESA <chr>, CESA, , school belongs COUNTY <chr>, county school located DISTRICT_CODE <chr> four-number code district, "[Statewide]" SCHOOL_CODE <chr> six-digit code school, "[Districtwide]" GRADE_GROUP <chr> elementary, middle, high, k-12, etc. CHARTER_IND <chr> whether school charter DISTRICT_NAME <chr> human-readable name district. consistent across years SCHOOL_NAME <chr> human-readable name school. consistent across years TEST_SUBJECT <chr> language math GRADE_LEVEL <chr> K-12 TEST_RESULT <chr> bad, mediocre, acceptable, awesome TEST_RESULT_CODE <chr> one four corresponding TEST_RESULT TEST_GROUP <chr> dunno GROUP_BY <chr> demographic categories like race gender GROUP_BY_VALUE <chr> demographic groups like Asian Trans STUDENT_COUNT <int> number students test result GROUP_COUNT <int> number students demographic category FORWARD_AVERAGE_SCALE_SCORE <dbl> mean Forward score group

title: Column specification for data about performance on the Forward Exam — SPEC_FOR_FORWARD
text: https://dpi.wi.gov/wisedash/download-files/type?field_wisedash_upload_type_value=Forward

what: Column specification for data about High School Completion — SPEC_FOR_HS_COMPLETION
title: Column specification for data about High School Completion — SPEC_FOR_HS_COMPLETION
text: Column specification data High School Completion

title: Column specification for data about High School Completion — SPEC_FOR_HS_COMPLETION
Column specification for data about High School Completion — SPEC_FOR_HS_COMPLETION
text: list 17 elements SCHOOL_YEAR <chr> school year, YYYY-YY format AGENCY_TYPE <chr> helps distinguish district-run independent charter schools CHARTER_IND <chr> whether school charter CESA <chr>, CESA, , school belongs COUNTY <chr>, county school located DISTRICT_CODE <chr> four-number code district, "[Statewide]" SCHOOL_CODE <chr> six-digit code school, "[Districtwide]" GRADE_GROUP <chr> elementary, middle, high, k-12, etc. DISTRICT_NAME <chr> human-readable name district. consistent across years SCHOOL_NAME <chr> human-readable name school. consistent across years COHORT <int> expected graduation year, e.g. 2010 2009-10 school year COMPLETION_STATUS <chr> graduated normally, graduated HSED, continuing, GROUP_BY <chr> demographic categories like race gender GROUP_BY_VALUE <chr> demographic groups like Asian Trans TIMEFRAME <chr> whether 4-, 5-, 6-year rate, etc. COHORT_COUNT <int> number students completed high school STUDENT_COUNT <int> number students completed high school

title: Column specification for data about High School Completion — SPEC_FOR_HS_COMPLETION
text: https://dpi.wi.gov/wisedash/download-files/type?field_wisedash_upload_type_value=hs-completion

Column specification for data about Post-secondary Enrollment — SPEC_FOR_PS_ENROLLMENT
text: list 18 elements SCHOOL_YEAR <chr> school year, YYYY-YY format AGENCY_TYPE <chr> helps distinguish district-run independent charter schools CHARTER_IND <chr> whether school charter CESA <chr>, CESA, , school belongs COUNTY <chr>, county school located DISTRICT_CODE <chr> four-number code district, "[Statewide]" SCHOOL_CODE <chr> six-digit code school, "[Districtwide]" GRADE_GROUP <chr> elementary, middle, high, k-12, etc. DISTRICT_NAME <chr> human-readable name district. consistent across years SCHOOL_NAME <chr> human-readable name school. consistent across years INITIAL_ENROLLMENT <chr> time lag graduation enrollment INSTITUTION_LOCATION <chr> -state --state INSTITUTION_LEVEL <chr> 2-year 4-year INSTITUTION_TYPE <chr> public private GROUP_BY <chr> demographic categories like race gender GROUP_BY_VALUE <chr> demographic groups like Asian Trans GROUP_COUNT <int> number students enrolled postsecondary education STUDENT_COUNT <int> number students enrolled postsecondary education

title: Column specification for data about Post-secondary Enrollment — SPEC_FOR_PS_ENROLLMENT
text: https://dpi.wi.gov/wisedash/download-files/type?field_wisedash_upload_type_value=Postsecondary

what: hercwidpi: utilities and specifications for parsing data from the WI DPI — hercwidpi-package
title: hercwidpi: utilities and specifications for parsing data from the WI DPI — hercwidpi-package
text: Work files downloaded Wisconsin Department Public Instruction. basic action parse annual text files wrangle tidy multi-year tables. utilities summarizing – area, agency, demographic grouping. Additional tools use percentiles compare across otherwise incompatible test results.

title: hercwidpi: utilities and specifications for parsing data from the WI DPI — hercwidpi-package
text: Maintainer: Ben Taft ben.taft@career2cradle.org contributors: Higher Expectations Racine County [copyright holder]

title: Summarize forward results — wrangle_forward
text: Summarize forward results

title: Summarize forward results — wrangle_forward
Summarize forward results — wrangle_forward
text: .forward_data data frame columns SPEC_FOR_FORWARD ... <dynamic-dots> <chr> grouping fields computing testing success rates. .proficiency_threshold <int?> lowest score code counts proficient (defaults 3)

title: Summarize forward results — wrangle_forward
text: data frame len(...) + 6 columns ... grouping field Students <int> total number students group Score <dbl> mean scale score group's students Tested <int> number students group took test Proficient <int> number students tested achieved proficiency Testing Rate <dbl> proportion students group took test Proficiency Rate <dbl> proportion students tested achieved proficiency
